name: Bit Colony
description:
Bit Colony is a game of strategy and management of colony. The goal is to control a colony placed in a foreign world and manage your resources.

The game is in a completely developing version, even that description is under development, everything is under development, including you. The game will soon have its first stable version, with more objectives and a fixed gameplay.



08/12/2018 - 0.3.0

  • Added "Game Setup" menu.
  • Added "More Resources" option in game setup.
  • Added "Enemies" option in game setup.
  • Fixed small errors.

07/31/2018 - 0.2.0

  • Added "Drone" enemy with 3 variations.
  • Added "Colony Center".
  • Added "Quit" button.
  • Added game over screen.
  • Now mines will work.
  • Changed all ore sprites.
  • Fixed small errors.
  • Massive bug fix.

07/23/2018 - 0.1.0

  • Started the alpha.
  • Now resource machines will need energy.
  • Now there will be an initial production of energy.
  • Removed some introduction scene resources.
  • Fixed small errors.

07/22/2018 - 0.0.5

  • Launched the game.
Current version: 0.3.0
